Tonglu is a country seat situated on the upper Fuchun River , which is the head water of Qiantang River that flows into
Hangzhou
.
Tonglu has more than 400,000 inhabitants .

The main international hub for the region is Shanghai
Pudong Airport
.
is closer ; it has flights to most major Chinese cities and some international flights .

The closest train connection is in Hangzhou , where you can catch a fast
bullet train
to Hongqiao station in Shanghai or south toward
Ningbo
and
Fujian
.
From Hangzhou you can take a bus or drive a private vehicle along motorways G2501/G25 or G320 .
Get off at the Tonglu exit .
Tonglu is where you can escape the polluted cities of the north , take a stroll through nature , and experience cultural heritage , such as opera , embroidery and ceramics .

item.s: Some notable natural destinations include Baiyunyuan , Babisong , Yaolinxianjing , Langshijintang and Yangshanfan .

Fenshui is about 30 km from Tonglu downtown .

would the first option for visitors interested in nature .
Mount Daqi is near downtown Tonglu and is accessible via public bus and taxi , or on foot .
Daqishan has crystal clear streams and pools , diverse vegetation , gigantic but lifelike rocks , uncountable types of birds and tiny insects , and fresh air .

Local villages include
Yanshanfan Village
and
Hengcun Village
, which have special festivals at certain times of the year .
Hengcun has a festival every March 8th of the Lunar calendar .
Village will have a Follower Festival that is always held in the spring when Peach Blossoms bloom across the countryside .
During the festival you can stroll through the mountains and enjoy performances put on by locals .

p.s: You can get rest in Tonglu .
Take your time enjoy your holiday in nature .
If you visit Tonglu in spring and all the flowers come out , you will fall in love with this city .
If you like doing sports , Tonglu is also a good place for you .
The Tonglu Sports Centre is fully equipped .
You can buy fresh produce from local farmers at green grocers around the city .
Traditional gifts for such as embroideries and ceramics are also plentiful .
General goods can be bought large supermarkets around the city .
There is delicious food in Tonglu .
